messages.message: I think a nice feature from build is to be able to take a doucment that went thru an app and if you have any concerns with it or want to drill into it further to be able to click open in converse and be able to converse with the document right out of a app batch

When you say “went thru an app” do you mean a “went thru a deployed solution in production”? If so, I think what you’re suggesting is actually on the roadmap as part of the human review experience. Except instead of opening in converse, we’d open in build to allow users to investigate why a document might be needing human review. @andy might have more on that.
I think both. Go into converse to ask more questions and go into build to fix
I think the long term vision here should be to have Converse be available at any point when you’re interacting with a Document
